name: Blossom Splash Color Garden
description:
Blossom Splash - Color Garden connect delicious blossom to crush them and make an explosion.
This is the ultimate smasher game with many levels will addict you.
Use different boosters to clear all obstacles.
Add power ups by connecting same blossom in a flow.

Link the blossoms and eliminate fleshy flowers.

Dash through garden and harvest blossom

How To Play Blossom Splash - Color Garden:

Make a line of blossoms and pop them.
Catch the blossom that are identical and smash it.

Features:

- High rated graphics
- Different and interesting Obstacles.
- Lots of beautiful and fresh blossoms.
